name: NCAT
description: During the height of the bull market in 2021, NCAT was the first Nyan cat meme token to launch. Known for its vibrant colors and upbeat rhythm, the Nyan Cat meme resonated worldwide. Shortly after, NCAT quickly caught the wave, catapulting to a market cap of over $150 million dollars. It was more than a token; it was a community, a game, a marketplace, an NFT project, and most importantly, a thriving community.In the world of crypto memes, community is the lifeblood that keeps the vibes alive. We are incredibly proud of the community we fostered around NCAT of over 14,000 dedicated supporters.
